examples.text: he's a whisperer—you can hardly hear a word he says

definitions: a person who spreads gossip or rumors

examples.text: the whisperers say the committee that appointed him was divided

shortDefinitions: person who spreads gossip or rumours

definitions: a person skilled in taming or training a specified kind of animal, typically using body language and gentle vocal encouragement rather than physical contact

examples.text: he's reportedly set to quit show business to become a horse whisperer

shortDefinitions: person skilled in taming or training specified kind of animal
